title: 08/13: Running Backs Previews (Part One) (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
Is RB loaded at the top this year, or will there be the inevitable early-round busts? We take a look at an exciting position with overall strategies (2:00), our thoughts on Zero-RB (11:08), how things change in different formats (25:50) and other ways to dominate at RB. Today we focus specifically on the Top 10 RBs before digging deeper on tomorrow's episode ... Sleepers (27:35), breakouts (32:45) and busts (36:33). Will LeSean McCoy get enough touches to be a Fantasy starter? Is Alex Collins ready for the spotlight? ... ADP review (45:05) for the Top 10 RBs with intense debate on who might bust, who can reach a new level, if Alvin Kamara is due for regression or is ready to take over as the lead Saints RB and why people are drafting Saquon Barkley over more proven young RBs ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
